website_summaries.verdict: The Ecco Soft 7 Sneaker is a classic example that one needs not to be risqué to be good. These sneakers may exude a what-you-see-is-what-you-get aura because of how simple its design is. But, delving into each element of the shoe, from the materials used, the infused technology, down to its strategically designed silhouette, show that these are worth are more deserving look.
pros: Numerous purchasers praise the versatility of the Ecco Soft 7 sneaker that can match a variety of outfits
Walking and traveling becomes a more pleasurable experience because of how comfortable these sneakers are, according to a high number of purchasers
Despite its steep price, many find that this shoe is worth every penny
A reviewer is surprised that the Ecco Soft 7 sneakers do not make the feet hurt compared to extremely cushioned running shoes
Some consumers, who suffer from foot and back issues have pointed out that this kick can accommodate their orthotics
The insoles of the shoe are like contoured pillows that mold to the feet which boosts its comfort, others have noted
Even though the upper of the shoe offers the feeling of plushness, the construction is still solid, according to one tester
The Ecco Soft 7 Sneaker gives the same vibe as the Converse All Star low-cut in leather
One also dubbed the white colorway as a better alternative to the Adidas Stan Smith
Like other Ecco Soft sneakers, it offers a wide array of color options
cons: Many would appreciate these sneakers more if there are half-size options
Several purchasers complain about the laces being too short and not staying well-put
Few wearers feel bothered that the bottom produces a squeaky sound

customer_reviews.title: Good product would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Had read a few reviews about these and a little concerned about both fit and if they would be to shiney. No need to worry fit great and not shiney, have worn them in house and out and comfortable and so far not picked up dirt. Clearly white soles will get dirty at some point, though so far so good
customer_reviews.author: JayLpool

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable shoe that you can wear all day. The quality of the leather is great as are the shoes in general. They some with a removable insole for size adjustment and even without I found them to be a snug tight but not uncomfortable . Only quibble (and I see others mention it) is that white soles do stain easily and it does not come out.
customer_reviews.author: M TWOMEY

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneakers, but didn't like the "Whisky" textured leather.
customer_reviews.text: I've had about 5 pairs of the Ecco Soft 7 trainer. They're awesome. Classically styled, comfortable and long lasting. However, these have a texture to the leather that wasn't easily noticed on the product photos. You may well like them, but they're just not to my taste, that's all. So, I'm giving five stars because they are top quality. Just be mindful that the "whisky" colourway is a bit "old mannish".
customer_reviews.author: D. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fundamentally flawed
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have a fundamental flaw...you can't clean the light sole and heel. They are consigned to dog walking. Very comfy but not worth the money because of the flaw. Raised with ECCO too, no response, so they are clearly not bothered, just happy to take your money.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Coote

customer_reviews.title: Too shiny for me
customer_reviews.text: I already had a pair purchased from an Ecco shop. However when I received the shoes from Amazon they were quite shiny and looked cheap and had a different finish to the one bought from Ecco.
customer_reviews.author: Darren P

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Not my first paid of ECCO footwear and definitely won’t be the last. Very stylish trainer that can be worn with either jeans or chinos. Wore them all day straight out of the box and after an hour it felt as if I had been wearing them for months. In fairness I have another pair of Soft 7 boots so knew what to expect.
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!!:) really great style
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes comfy, little bit noisy but after one wear really good and the noisy habit will disappear I am sure
customer_reviews.author: lolnmo133

customer_reviews.title: Despite Ecco suggestion and careful choice shoes are too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are of good quality, stil in most shoes I wear a 46 eu size, according to Ecco size chart, everywhere, I should have a 45 eu, to my disapointement the shoes can be worn but they are too narrow, in the bottem line I should have ordered a 46. I suggest one should be very carefull. I dont have the time to return them, so all in all it is a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Gavriel B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Ecco trainers
customer_reviews.text: Good quality Ecco trainers. Looks very smart. Very comfortable. Needed 7.5 normally take 7
customer_reviews.author: Exangus

customer_reviews.title: they are so comfortable and hard-wearing
customer_reviews.text: Ecco shoes are really something else. They are probably more expensive than your everyday shoes, however, they are so comfortable and hard-wearing. The packaging was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Ray MAGINLEY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable but needed to go one size up to get the rightfitting
customer_reviews.author: M. Stemp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent comfort
customer_reviews.text: Already have the golf version of this shoe so knew the ' straight out of the box' comfort benefits
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase very good value against High Street Ecco store retailer
customer_reviews.author: Ian Leighton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly and were just as described. Received very quickly 😊
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Perry

customer_reviews.title: and I couldn't be happier with this product for the price I paid
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting to be able to justify paying a higher than average price for a pair of casual shoes, and I couldn't be happier with this product for the price I paid!!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Cade

customer_reviews.title: It's so comfy and pretty.
customer_reviews.text: It's been about two months and I am so satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: YK Min

customer_reviews.title: On time as usual
customer_reviews.text: Great comfy trainers and at a great price delivered on time no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Richard W Crisp

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable and he wears them all the
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. Extremely comfortable and he wears them all the time
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Hay / Sean Hay

customer_reviews.title: One of my better purchases
customer_reviews.text: I have sore and often swollen feet, these are ideal for room and comfort. Pretty smart too.
customer_reviews.author: Push the Button

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As always fir great, look really smart. Always a great buy the Ecco products
customer_reviews.author: Ray White

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes with good quality and perfect look, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Style and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Smart style. Good quality and well in made in Slovakia. Soft leather,comfy, wide fitting and have a cosy feel. I have sensitive flat feet and a bunion but these are a treat to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Suvannamani

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sneakers! It is the first time I get ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Sneakers! It is the first time I get Ecco shoes and I am very happy with them! Just one note: the sizes are totally different to any other shoes I have ever worn!
customer_reviews.author: Raulito

product_meta.title: ECCO Men's Soft 7 M Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: Rich leather and laser-engraved details provide an Instant Update to the classic Ecco soft seven sneakers. This laid-back, urban essential ensures a light step and keeps the minimalist design in focus.
feature_bullets: Crafted from smooth, full-grain leather, made in our own tanneries
Textile lining offers softness and breathability
Padded sides for a distinct look and long-lasting comfort
Textile laces are easily adjusted for a secure fit
